question: India will declare ____ Yoga Parks across the country to promote the traditional practice.
explanation: Indian government has plans to declare a hundred parks especially dedicated for yoga activities across the country to promote the traditional practice. Prime Minister Narendra Modi will participate in the main event of the International Day of Yoga (IDY) which will be held in Lucknow, on June 21. Around 150 countries are expected to participate in the mega event, with Indian Missions in those nations coordinating the activities.
